betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The shredder doesnt double your ores (thats what the crusher is for), but it turn items you throw in it into dusts.  The shredder will take full machines, to get their crafting materials back as dusts.  In order to make a shredder you will need a crystaline diamond plate which would require a Flawless Diamond or better.  You can craft the crystaline diamond plate by placing the flawless Diamond and saw into a crafting grid.  If you use better diamonds, you will get additional crystaline diamond plates.  Once you make a cutter, you can also craft these plates there with a regular diamond but that machine is hard to come by at this stage.
Â§a
In order to complete this quest craft:
1 Bronze Shredder
